title: Australia's north-west
creator_credit: Oliver Howes, Donald Crombie and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Provides glimpses of the change taking place in the desert and sparsely settled cattle country of Australia’s north-west. The Ord River Irrigation scheme, new crops, new methods of cattle breeding, the iron ore mining boom, new towns, new people - all these contribute to the expansion of this little known corner of Australia.
